website_summaries.verdict: It's more than a trimmer with its multiple tips, but it's costly and might not work for everyone.
pros: Boasts exfoliator and multiple trimming tips for precise results
Ideal for trimming wet or dry
cons: It doesn't work quite as well on course, thick hair

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy Bikini Trimming
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this electric shaver based on the recommendation of a friend since I was sick of using a traditional razor and getting razor burn or ingrowns every week. I've been using it for a month now and love it! I really only use the main attachment and the small spot trimmer to get my bikini line trimmed down as close to the skin as possible. I charged the device once right when I got it and it still is doing great after using 1-2 times a week since then. I've just been using it on dry skin, though I'm sure I could also use it in the shower if I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well for grooming the nether regions. ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well for grooming the nether regions. Only gave 4 stars because I noticed it nicked me. However, I'm not sure if this is a product issue, user error, or my sensitive skin postpartum.
customer_reviews.author: Katie May

customer_reviews.title: The best trimmer I've found.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other grooming kits, and this one is the best I have found so far. Each attachment works well. It holds a charge for a long time, provides a nice close cut without pulling hair or nicking the skin, and will last a long time. I had my first one for years, then accidentally dropped it in the tub, so had to buy a new one. Whoops.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I had a Remington i had for over 10+ years and it worked perfect... finally died on me... i needed a new one so i decided to go with this one, & its perfect. Light weight and very easy to use.. i use it for bikini area and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie M.

customer_reviews.title: Okay while lasted
customer_reviews.text: This was okay while it lasted. Around 6 months old it started losing power very quickly. At first it would charge but now less than a year old won't charge. Even with the charging cable plugged in and the green light visible, it does not work. Useless. Don't expect to last a year.
customer_reviews.author: 88klw

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Fits description perfectly and doesn't irritate the skin. I also love that it's a nice size and easy to hold, and comes with a cute travel bag. Very good trimmer at a decent price. Works better than a more expensive one I'd previously purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer is great. The attachments are great. And I think the fact that I don't have to mess with batteries and can just recharge it is super great.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Hopeless
customer_reviews.text: At first, this did the job, although not terribly well. Mere months of (infrequent) use later, it no longer holds a charge at all and even with the power cable in barely manages more than a sad sound and ineffectual shudder. No longer fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Helen L. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great razor for teens too!
customer_reviews.text: My teen loves this shaver. It’s doesn't irritate and it’s less rust of a cut.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I got this item 3 days early from its original date. Looks super nice! Can’t wait to try it out!

customer_reviews.title: amazing trimmer. absolutely perfect for sensitive areas
customer_reviews.text: amazing trimmer. absolutely perfect for sensitive areas. This will not get you smooth like a razor or wax, but will never cause irritation. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It is better than the larger model because the stem and head are more narrow, allowing it to be more maneuverable. It seems very solid and came fully charged too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P

customer_reviews.title: Pain-free and does its job
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about nicks and pulls, after reading the other comments. I didn't have any issues with this product and was very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Charges well, ans works but pulls occasionally. Also the cutting edge is small..which is good for dexderity..but bad for ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Allison F.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this product. You can barely see it getting the job done. Only one of the razor heads are truly usable. It pulls and tugs and makes a mess. Better than nothing, but not my favorite product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren W

customer_reviews.title: Worked well 2 times
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 2 times. Then the shaver broke. Bought anither kind.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Denny

customer_reviews.title: Love this razor
customer_reviews.text: Shaves close with no razor burn. Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Rockenstyre

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Compared it to the Conair, they are both in the same league to me.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: It has nicked me every time I use it. I'm still using it until I can find a decent replacement but it's not nearly as good as the older model I had had before by Remington.
customer_reviews.author: becky davidson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS!!! It's cute and comes with all these attachments, but it lasted on 2 months and i used it 3 times....I charge it the green light comes on but once I take it off, it doesn't work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about a month. Doesn’t cut like I thought
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: I had another Remington product that lasted 10 years so felt confident in buying this product
customer_reviews.text: Great value, holds charge, easy to use. My husband uses it to trim his mustache too
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K Hillier

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted. Unfortunately it only lasted through one charge. Died after the second charge. Would rather spend the money on something thst lasts at least a year and not just two months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick trims and regular upkeep
customer_reviews.text: A must have for personal care. Great for quick trims and regular upkeep.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: Broken already
customer_reviews.text: One of the heads broke after the first use. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and hold. Not a close shaver but a nice trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Hattie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is great!! read reviews and glad I chose this product
customer_reviews.author: LSD

customer_reviews.title: Loses its charge quickly
customer_reviews.text: Just get the battery one you can use in the shower or bath.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Product was just as described and fast shipping! Replaces the old model perfectly, works great!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I got a Panasonic bikini trimmer that I do not like because it pulls on my hairs down there and hurts. This one does not do that as long as you use the exfoliator with some unscented soap to lather up the area first. Yes, you can do it dry, but it is not a good idea because it will pull and it will make your skin sensitive. I had the pink battery-powered (as in not rechargeable) verson of this first and it eventually stopped working. I like that this one is rechargeable. It also has a few more attachments. Hopefully this one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. No pulling or pinching. All the attachments are handy.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gets as clean of shave as an electric razor can.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Warning- may cause cancer and reproductive harm (per packaging)
customer_reviews.text: Returned due to frightening warnings on the exterior packaging... Warning: Cancer and reproductive harm Warning: This product contains a chemical known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm. If I had known this product came with such a risk, I wouldn't have ordered it. I felt it was important information to share to other potential buyers!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Abbatoy

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I really like one of the tips, but the rest weren't too much help. 2 of them kept pulling and nipping me. Glad I could try multiple types though. I took some stars away because the battery doesn't last long and it takes a really long time to charge back up. I can use it for trimming twice and it dies towards the end of round two. Tried to let it charge for a half hour after that and it barely made it 5 more minutes. Does a good job though if you don't mind charging it for every use to ensure it doesn't die on you.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: used it not even three times, now it won't charge or turn on anymore. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: This model not only works great, but I like the attachments better
customer_reviews.text: My old trimmer stopped holding a charge and th price to replace the same model of Remington mysteriously went up to $50+. This model not only works great, but I like the attachments better.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: You Can Keep Your Birth Defects Remington
customer_reviews.text: I returned the trimmer without ever using it because of a a sticker on the package that said, "This product contains a chemical know to cause birth defects in the state of California and other reproductive harm."
customer_reviews.author: Julie Annunziato

customer_reviews.title: No nicks!! Wash in sink!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this trimmer! I had gone through the gamut of bikini trimmers ranging from cheap to expensive to borrowing my boyfriend's. They all suck and nick me. This is the best one I've found. I like all the attachments, although I usually only use the narrow or wide clipper ones. I can wash it in the sink. No nicks at all! Rechargable and comfortable to hold. If you have been searching for the best bikini trimmer, this is it. And it comes in a convenient little pouch too.
customer_reviews.author: christa moeller

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: After having an older model of this for many years, I decided to upgrade to this version. Not a good decision. The guard does not allow for as close of a trim as the old one. It is under-powered and loses battery quickly. It does not do a clean job either trimming or shaving and I have more in-grown hairs now using this product. Most annoyingly, whatever mechanism inside that twist-locks the interchangeable heads broke, and for a while, I could not get any head attached. Eventually forced the shaver part back on, but it is now stuck forever and the other pieces are useless. Ready to throw this away.
customer_reviews.author: Laine

customer_reviews.title: Misses hairs frequently
customer_reviews.text: This trims some hairs, but misses other hairs in the exact same vicinity (same lenght too). Would recommend you purchase a better trimmer if you want consistent clipping/shaving of hairs. The one good this is it has a rotating brush head that exfoliates. I have a remington from 10+ years ago, and it still shaves hair better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This charges fast and works flawlessly! It does not nick you like a lot of other shavers do. easy to hold and to change out the different heads. leaves a clean cutting path, and minimal skin irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Rewbydoo

customer_reviews.title: I love this trimmer and use it to trim the hair ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this trimmer and use it to trim the hair around my dog's eyes. I like this because it can't cut the dog and is quiet and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Beachlover27

customer_reviews.title: Broke within seconds...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this. I spent a day charging it up, and when I used it, I tried the shaver attachment. It broke in the first stroke, and didn't touch any hair. The spring and blade inside popped out, and the mesh covering it won't go back in correctly. I'll be returning it. Shame that an expensive shaver is so useless.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this trimmer. It holds a good charge and is easy to handle. Like any trimmer you have to be extra gentle in sensitive areas or you will cut your your skin, I'm careful and have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyShopper

customer_reviews.title: which she had 2 and loved and this is the new model
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this as a replacement for her old Remington, which she had 2 and loved and this is the new model. She says this one is clumsy and doesn't trim as well as the old one. The comb design clogs up and then it won't cut, also it isn't as precise as the old one. Since we bought it online, we won't send it back, but if we bought it at a store, we would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Gebby

customer_reviews.title: Remmington uses to make better razors. This comb was a joke
customer_reviews.text: Remmington uses to make better razors. This comb was a joke, too thick and bulky to separate hair. The used to have it at two millimeters, but this left hair much longer
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and comes in handy in a pinch. Holds a charge for a long time and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Aubree Brunette

customer_reviews.title: Battery Ceases to Hold Charge Within Months
customer_reviews.text: The shape and angle of the blades made it awkward to hold. The batteries stopped charging after about 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: DoomBiscuit

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It didn't curl my lashes. I would not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: rojas

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well enough at first but won't hold charge long enough for use even after charging for 24 hours. Corded use doesn't work either. The motor sounds like it's dying and attachments pull on hair. Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: btyrbl2

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is so convenient It covers everything you can possibly think of.
customer_reviews.author: KAC

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Completely stopped working after 3 months of barely using it! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: DiamondDog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It works very well and hold a charge for days.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbeaker

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a battery operated version of this trimmer. This version works just as well - plus it's rechargeable. Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Irish50

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this trimmer for a few weeks now and I love it. It works great on the bikini area and underarms. It's so much quicker and easier than shaving. Just a few seconds and you're done. It's not going to be as close a shave as a razor of course. However since it only trims above the skin you're not going to get razor burn or in-grown hairs like you can get with a razor. It's not meant for legs since you can see some stubble, but otherwise it's a great trimmer. It doesn't prick or pull the skin and the battery charge lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kari M.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Well, it has lots of attachments, but the smaller and larger clippers actually drew blood from my tender bits. Not nice. However, the larger clipper is okay for everyday grooming, and the foil attachment is okay. Not great. I would look around if you want closer grooming (of course you'll never get ultra-smooth from a shaver- you have to wax for that).
customer_reviews.author: ez_cheez

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great size and very convenient to use in the shower. The only problem I have is that the clear plastic guard is hard to remove and replace-- it seems to get stuck in the grooves.
customer_reviews.author: hellosunshine101

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: I like this trimmer. There is nothing wrong with it, but it doesn't compare to my last one. This trimmer was the closest one I could find to the previous trimmer I owned. It doesn't seem to have enough power to trim properly. You have to keep going over the same area many times, but that seems to be the only issue that I have with it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Dimmick

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise great product! I use it for everything and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it came with the smaller piece for eyebrows. The older version did, but this one does not. Otherwise great product! I use it for everything and it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Edger Ralfson

customer_reviews.title: Too easy to break, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter dropped this in the shower the first time using it and it shattered.
customer_reviews.author: EdTheTalkingHorse

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive arm pits and use the white soothing brush and I haven't had any irritating red bumps/zits in my armpit ever since I've used it! It also holds charge for a long time! Definitely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Meng

customer_reviews.title: not like other razors I have had
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is very rough...sharp...not like other razors I have had....disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Donna-Lynn McHale

customer_reviews.title: but the other trimmer heads work great.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the device for almost a year and haven't had any issues. i have to be careful when using the main trimmer head on sensitive areas because it has pinched my skin a couple of times, but the other trimmer heads work great.
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: A little tricky to use
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work as well as I would have liked. You have to move very slowly to get all the hair off
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It gas a lot of attachments. It doesn't necessarily give you a real close shave.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lowa

product_meta.title: Remington WPG4030C Ultimate Body and Bikini Grooming Kit, Purple
product_meta.description: This precise, all in one grooming kit can be used in and out of the shower. Designed for delicate body and bikini areas, the detail trimmer with comfort tips makes it ideal for sensitive skin and delicate areas. The NEW exfoliator brush head is the perfect.
feature_bullets: Gentle Trimmer: Covered, dual sided blade for delicate areas

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
